title: Make Final Boss Veigar /Taunt Stay until he moves
body:
Talking about the emote that makes him turn into a pixilated 2D sprite and falls off to the ground

can we make it stay that way until he moves?

replies.body: Unfortunately, due to gameplay concerns, we aren't able to. :c

Yeah, stealth veigar. Unnoticable.

Do you at least agree that if this wasn't the case, you'd do this?
If gameplay wasn't a concern, I think it'd be awesome. :P

What makes it different from, lets say, jinx laugh or the dance emotes?

the sudden model change? i see how that could be a problem
He's 2D, as opposed to someone who is still moving around.
ekko can do that and not break till he moves. with his ctrl+1.
